description: The virus response boss is among 10 arrested in a big healthcare corruption probe in hard-hit Italy.
title: Italy bribery probe nets Sicily coronavirus response chief
title_page: Italy bribery probe nets Sicily coronavirus response chief - BBC News
maintext: Col Gianluca Angelini of the financial police said they had discovered "a true centre of power¡­ in which dishonest public officials, unscrupulous businessmen and entrepreneurs are willing to do anything to obtain contracts worth millions".
